SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the top content creators from Spain, Latin America, and Andorra. Vote for your favorites and celebrate the innovation and talent on Twitch, YouTube, and more.

HERO_SUBTITLE: Awards for the Spanish-Speaking Streaming Community
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: Cinema has the Oscars, music has the Grammys, and streaming has the ESLAND. These awards celebrate the creativity and talent of the best content creators in the Spanish-speaking community.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Spain, Latin America, and Andorra are united by creators and their communities, to reminisce and relive some of the best moments of the year.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: After two successful galas, one at the Palau de la MÃºsica Catalana in Barcelona and another at the National Auditorium in Mexico City, we eagerly await the third edition in Andorra.
BENTO_TITLE_1: Andorra: The Zenith of the ESLAND Awards
BENTO_CONTENT_1: A new edition brimming with news and content, which will start several weeks before the much-anticipated gala. Expect special live performances, collaborations, concerts, and much more in what will be a real celebration of content creation.
BENTO_CONTENT_2: This year, the blue carpet moment will be enhanced and replaced by a white carpet in the snow, set against the stunning Andorran landscapes, on the ski slopes of Andorra.
BENTO_CONTENT_3: An awards ceremony filled with top-level content and many surprises, where the winners of the third edition of the ESLAND Awards will be revealed.
BENTO_CONTENT_4: This year, Reddit will not be part of the awards voting, but it will be part of the community. The official ESLAND Awards subreddit is open to you. Share your clips, opinions, and interact with the entire Spanish-speaking streaming community.
VIDEO_ALT: ESLAND - Awards for the Spanish-Speaking Streaming Community
PREFOOTER_VIDEO_TITLE: Guide to the 3rd Edition of the ESLAND Awards

VOTE.TITLE: The Voting Is Open
VOTE.INTRO_CONTENT: The most crucial moment has arrived. Cast your vote in the 3rd Edition of the Awards. Here are some tips to ensure your votes are counted correctly:
VOTE.ADVICE_1: Vote for up to 4 nominees per category, in order of preference.
VOTE.ADVICE_2: You do not have to vote in every category.
VOTE.ADVICE_3: The use of ranked voting is not mandatory, but it is recommended.
VOTE.ADVICE_4: Once you've made your choices, be sure to click 'submit my votes.'
VOTE.ADVICE_5: Remember to share your votes on social media.
VOTE.ADVICE_6: Choose wisely and double-check your votes; you only get one chance.
VOTE.TIME_LIMIT: Voting will be open until Sunday, January 14, at 12:00 p.m. (Spanish time)

FOOTER.DISCLAIMER: All rights reserved. - This is not the official website, developed by @midudev for educational purposes.

INFO_TITLE_1: Unique Recognition for Creators and Communities
INFO_CONTENT_1_1: The ESLAND Awards are a private initiative promoted by the famous streamer TheGrefg, aiming to support and recognize content creation in the Spanish-speaking sphere.
INFO_CONTENT_1_2: ESLAND is an acronym for SPAIN, LATIN AMERICA, AND ANDORRA, three regions that share a common language that unites them beyond any physical or virtual borders.
INFO_CONTENT_2_1: The trophy presented to the winners at the ceremony is a representation of the letter 'A' divided into three fragments, assembled as a futuristic gadget that builds the narrative of the event.
INFO_CONTENT_2_2: It's an artifact of unknown origin that provides tools and abilities for creation. It symbolizes the emancipation of talent through technology and the rise of content creators in the entertainment world.
